inclusion.criterion: Patients who are expected to undergo surgery under the diagnosis of ipsilateral breast tumor recurrence
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who had partial mastectomy and sentinel lymph node biopsy for prior operation for the initially diagnosed breast cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients considered to be axillary lymph node negative from clinical findings
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who understand and willingly participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with recurrence in other regions.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are not eligible to perform SLNB
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who received mastectomy or axillary lymph node dissection for prior operation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who experienced recurrence within a year from the primary operation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patientes who are known to have axillary lymph node metastasis before the secondary operation, histologically confirmed from tissue biopsy or cytology
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with a history of breast cancer and underwent lumpectomy. She has no palpable masses on breast exam and is using multivitamins daily.
